previous.excerpt:
This is the first time I see this take on corporate payouts in the media,
although I've heard prominent people murmuring about it here and there:
https://www.forbes.com/sites/danrunkevicius/2021/12/30/the-fed-unleashed-a-mega-bullish-force-for-these-stocks/?sh=2ece25d125dc

Very eye-opening.
previous.title: Buybacks are the dividends of the 21st century (incredible op-ed piece in the news)

localize.title: 回购是21世纪的红利(令人难以置信的新闻评论)
localize.the_new_excerpt:
这是我第一次在媒体上看到这种关于企业支出的报道，
尽管我听到一些知名人士在这里或那里低声议论这件事：
https://www.forbes.com/sites/danrunkevicius/2021/12/30/the-fed-unleashed-a-mega-bullish-force-for-these-stocks/?sh=2ece25d125dc

让人大开眼界。

localize.title: 回購是21世紀的紅利(令人難以置信的新聞評論)
localize.the_new_excerpt:
這是我第一次在媒體上看到這種關於企業支出的報道，
儘管我聽到一些知名人士在這裏或那裏低聲議論這件事：
https://www.forbes.com/sites/danrunkevicius/2021/12/30/the-fed-unleashed-a-mega-bullish-force-for-these-stocks/?sh=2ece25d125dc

讓人大開眼界。

next.excerpt:
Thoughts? VanEck filed again today for a Bitcoin ETF. I believe this will be the
second time they file. Before, they were seen to be one of the more promising
ones to have it passed first. After withdrawing their previous application,
they’ve submitted a new one…
next.title: VanEck filed again today for a Bitcoin ETF.

localize.title: 今天，Vaneck再次提交了比特币ETF的申请。
localize.the_new_excerpt:
有什么想法吗？今天，Vaneck再次提交了比特币ETF的申请。我相信这将是
他们第二次提交了申请。在此之前，他们被认为是最有前途的
先让它通过的人。在撤回他们之前的申请之后，
他们提交了一份新的…

localize.title: 今天，Vaneck再次提交了比特幣ETF的申請。
localize.the_new_excerpt:
有什麼想法嗎？今天，Vaneck再次提交了比特幣ETF的申請。我相信這將是
他們第二次提交了申請。在此之前，他們被認爲是最有前途的
先讓它通過的人。在撤回他們之前的申請之後，
他們提交了一份新的…
